subject: Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Fifteen months ago, the Norwegian skier Aksel Lund Svindal was lying limp in the snow after a crash in a downhill training run. This week, the most prestigious trophy in alpine skiing appears to be within his reach.
snippet: Fifteen months ago, the Norwegian skier Aksel Lund Svindal was lying limp in the snow after a crash in a downhill training run. This week, the most prestigious trophy in alpine skiing appears to be within his reach.
